heading: Content Block 1
summary: Human traffickingThe recruitment, transportation, transfer, harbouring or receipt of persons,by means of threats,use of force or other forms of psychological pressurefor the purpose of further exploitation.Find out what to do to reduce your vulnerability to human trafficking, learn more about child safety, find contacts where to report in case of suspicion of human trafficking.More information

heading: Content Block 2
summary: Guide for what to do in case of emergency or war“What to do in case of emergency or war” is a guide created by the Ukrainian authorities, in which you will find detailed instructions on how to prepare for emergencies and how to act if they occur.More information

heading: Content Block 3
summary: Map of shelters in RomaniaHere you can find alist of shelters in Romania.Here is alist of shelters in Bucharest.
